xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #phenotips on 29 June 2014
xwikidoc.content: <jim__> has quit 09:31 <akats> has joined #phenotips 09:32 <akats> sdumitriu: I forget how to override files through the skin. How do you specify the path, for example "uicomponents/widgets/" in the file name? 09:46 <sdumitriu1> akats: Let me check 09:47 <sdumitriu1> https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/blob/master/xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-oldcore/src/main/java/com/xpn/xwiki/XWiki.java#L1809 09:47 <sdumitriu1> So replace / with . 09:47 <akats> Thank you. 13:15 <sdumitriu1> akats: Instead of attaching the file to the skin, add it in distribution/war 13:22 <akats> Which issue are you referring to? The confirmation dialogue? 13:54 <akats> Which issue are you referring to? The confirmation dialogue? 14:06 <sdumitriu1> Yes 14:22 <akats> I vaguely remember you telling me that there is no way to tell what will overwrite what - xwiki files phenotips', or the other way around 18:11 <akats> has left #phenotips 23:15 <jim__> has quit
